artefact: Higher education courses: find and apply

artefact.overview: Find and apply for a college or university course
artefact.body:
You can search and apply for most higher education courses online.

Higher education courses are usually taught in universities, colleges and specialist institutions such as art schools or agricultural colleges. You can get a broad range of qualifications, for example diplomas, bachelor degrees and foundation degrees.

Full-time courses

UCAS - online application and search for full-time courses.

Part-time courses

National Careers Service - online search for part-time courses, apply directly to the college or university.

Open University courses

The Open University - online application and course search.

Music courses

CUKAS - online application and course search for music conservatoire courses.

Teacher training

The Training and Development Agency (TDA) - online application for teacher training.

Postgraduate courses

Prospects and Postgraduate Search - online searches for postgraduate study.
